item.title: Going Bowling
item.description: I had never been bowling at Purdue's bowling alley until a friend from home came to visit. Now I've been back twice.

item.title: Languages
item.description: Why does Duolingo not have more innovative competitors?

item.title: CS:240 Programming In C
item.description: Taking the notoriously difficult Programming In C course at Purdue, with the average GPA of the class being a 2.54.

item.title: Sledding down Purdue's Slayter Hill!
item.description: I had the oppourtunity to sled down Slayter Hill with my friends before midterms. The hill was packed with students, and the sole tree in the path was lined with garbage bags of straw.

item.title: Reading To Study
item.description: I am exploring just how much better focused reading from textbooks can be when compared to modern study methods such as AI or Youtube. This exploration brings up a much larger question of short-form and long-form content for entertainment.
